io.sphere.sdk.channels

Interface Channel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, Identifiable<Channel>, Referenceable<Channel>, Resource<Channel>, ResourceIdentifiable<Channel>, ResourceView<Channel,Channel>, Timestamped, Versioned<Channel>

    public interface Channel
extends Resource<Channel>
    Channels represent a source or destination of different entities.
    See Also:
    ChannelCreateCommand, ChannelUpdateCommand, ChannelDeleteCommand, ChannelQuery, ChannelByIdGet, LineItem.getSupplyChannel(), InventoryEntry.getSupplyChannel(), SyncInfo.getChannel(), Price.getChannel(), Review.getTarget()

      • referenceOfId

        static Reference<Channel> referenceOfId(java.lang.String id)
        Creates a reference for one item of this class by a known ID.

        An example for categories but this applies for other resources, too:

        final String categoryIdFromFormOrSession = "84ac4271-0fec-49d0-9fee-55586c565c58";
final Reference<Category> categoryReference = Category.referenceOfId(categoryIdFromFormOrSession);
assertThat(categoryReference.getId()).isEqualTo(categoryIdFromFormOrSession);

        See the test code.

        If you already have a resource object, then use toReference() instead:

        final Category category = getCategory();
final Reference<Category> categoryReference = category.toReference();
assertThat(category.getId()).isEqualTo(categoryReference.getId());

        See the test code.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the resource which should be referenced.
        Returns:
        reference
